instructions: Image titled Change Your Name on Telegram on Android Step 1 1 Open Telegram on your Android. It s a blue icon with a white paper airplane inside. You ll usually find it in the app drawer. Image titled Change Your Name on Telegram on Android Step 2 2 Tap . It s at the top-left corner of the screen. Image titled Change Your Name on Telegram on Android Step 3 3 Tap . It s near the bottom of the menu. Image titled Change Your Name on Telegram on Android Step 4 4 Tap . It s under the Info header. If you have a username set up in Telegram, it appears here as well. Image titled Change Your Name on Telegram on Android Step 5 5 Type a username. The minimum username length is 5 characters. Characters can be letters, numbers, and underscores. Image titled Change Your Name on Telegram on Android Step 6 6 Tap Image titled Android7done.png . It s at the top-right corner of the screen. Your new username is now saved. Other people on Telegram can now search for you by typing your username into the search bar. Advertisement
